text: The Österreichische Musikzeitschrift (ÖMZ, Austrian music magazine) was a monthly music magazine published in Vienna, Austria, by Verlag Musikzeit. It was established in 1945 by the Austrian cultural politician and music critic . It appeared until the end of 2010, edited by Marion Diederichs-Lafite with 745 issues. From 2011 to 2014, the magazine was published by Böhlau Verlag. From 2015 to the last edition in February 2018 it was published by Hollitzer. == Further reading == * Manfred Permoser: "Die Rezeption zeitgenössischer Musik seit '45 im Spiegel der österreichischen Musikzeitschrift", in ÖMZ 55/7 (2000), . * Marion Diederichs-Lafite: "Musik der Zeit – Zeit für Musik", in ÖMZ 50/11–12 (1995), . * Rudolf Stephan: "Musikzeitschrift und musikalische Öffentlichkeit", in: ÖMZ 50/11–12 (1995), . * Marion Diederichs-Lafite: "65 Jahre MUSIKZEITschrift", in ÖMZ 65/10–12 (2010), . ==References== ==External links== * Category:1945 establishments in Austria Category:2018 disestablishments in Austria Category:Magazines published in Austria Category:Monthly magazines published in Austria Category:Classical music magazines Category:Defunct magazines published in Austria Category:German- language magazines Category:Magazines established in 1945 Category:Magazines disestablished in 2018 Category:Magazines published in Vienna
title: Österreichische Musikzeitschrift
